Articles.Content:
When seeing this:

I had to try in KSP, only needs the KAX mod!

An Auto-Gyro is an aircraft without wings but gets lift by an un-powered main rotor. When moving forward the wind coming in turns the rotor blades

It works like this in real life AND in KSP!! Im amazed, but it is really slow.

This one is balanced to near perfection as i might say myself, just press space, full throttle and it takes off all by itself.

Great for zipping along the coast or island hopping.

http://www.filedropper.com/autogyroexperimentalmk2
